entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
